name: get_sessions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool optitalk.
Tool description: Create custom highly advanced general AI chatbots and characters with distinct personalities, and knowledgebase. Engage with a vast library of user-generated characters.

http://optitalk.net/

## Key Features
- **Personalized chatbots and characters**: Craft unique and engaging characters with distinct personalities, backstories, and interests to bring your stories, games, or applications to life.
- **Explore user-generated characters**: Access a vast library of user-created chatbots and char...
API description: Fetch a list of chat sessions and their corresponding `session_id` for a given character.

character_id.description: The unique identifier of the character whose sessions are being retrieved.

page_size.description: The number of sessions to retrieve per page. Defaults to 25.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
